statements.select: select '´©°è' SUM_TOTAL , count(reg_dt) AS REG_CNT , count(SAFE_EDU_CMPLT_DT) AS SAFE_CNT , (select sum(tt1.doc_cnt) from ( select case when t1.cnt = t2.cnt then 1 else 0 end doc_cnt from ( select emp_id, accp_gb, count(*) cnt from SE_TA_ATTC_FILE group by plant_id, ta_id, accp_gb, emp_id ) T1 inner join ( select accp_gb, count(*) cnt from SE_TA_ATTC_DOC_MAN group by accp_gb) T2 on T1.ACCP_GB = t2.ACCP_GB ) tt1) AS DOC_CNT , count(ACCESS_POSSIBLE_DT) AS POS_CNT From SE_TA_EMP a
